data.name: Odium: Support the developer & Achievements
data.detailed_description:
Description

'Support the developer' is an optional DLC for Odium,
Odium is a Free game with no additional content you have to pay for.
You can purchase this DLC as a token of appreciation to us, the development team.
(We love you too ♥)

Achievements

Oh yes!
By purchasing this DLC you also unlock our Steam achievements!
Destroyed any boxes yet?
How many times did you defeat Dennis? not enough!
Well, you better get going then!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3 3rd generation or AMD A4 5300
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX480+ or Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 3rd generation or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX960+ or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
